stage1.example: 他的座位挨着我。(tā de zuò wèi āi zhé wǒ) - His seat is next to mine.
我们挨门挨户地访问。(wǒ men ái mén ái hù de fǎng wèn) - We visited door by door.

stage1.definition: To take a beating, to get thrashed, to come under attack
stage1.example: 那个孩子因为调皮挨打了。(nà gè hái zi yīn wèi tiáo pí ái dǎ le) - That child was beaten for being naughty.
所有乘客都必须通过安检。(suǒ yǒu chéng kè dōu bì xū tōng guò ān jiǎn) - All passengers must go through the security check.

stage1.definition: To go on strike, a strike (by workers)
stage1.example: 工人们决定罢工抗议。(gōng rén men jué dìng bà gōng kàng yì) - The workers decided to go on strike in protest.

stage2.definition: That's all, nothing more, (used as an auxiliary word)
stage2.example: 我只是说说罢了。(wǒ zhǐ shì shuō shuō bà le) - I was just saying, that's all.
他是一名白领工作者。(tā shì yī míng bái lǐng gōng zuò zhě) - He is a white-collar worker.
通货膨胀率上升了两个百分点。(tōng huò péng zhàng lǜ shàng shēng le liǎng gè bǎi fēn diǎn) - The inflation rate rose by two percentage points.

stage2.definition: To work, to handle official business, to work in an office
stage2.example: 他在家里办公。(tā zài jiā lǐ bàn gōng) - He works from home.
公司在上海设有办事处。(gōng sī zài shàng hǎi shè yǒu bàn shì chù) - The company has an office in Shanghai.

stage3.definition: To run a school, to establish a school
stage3.example: 政府支持民间办学。(zhèng fǔ zhī chí mín jiān bàn xué) - The government supports private education.
他们进入了半决赛。(tā men jìn rù le bàn jué sài) - They advanced to the semifinal.
傍晚的时候，我们去散步。(bàng wǎn de shí hòu, wǒ men qù sàn bù) - In the evening, we went for a walk.
保健品市场发展迅速。(bǎo jiàn pǐn shì chǎng fā zhǎn xùn sù) - The health care product market is developing rapidly.
报刊上报道了这一事件。(bào kān shàng bào dào le zhè yī shì jiàn) - The press reported on this event.

stage4.definition: To register for an examination, to apply to take an exam
stage4.example: 他报考了北京大学。(tā bào kǎo le běi jīng dà xué) - He applied for Beijing University.
我对此感到抱歉。(wǒ duì cǐ gǎn dào bào qiàn) - I feel sorry about this.
暴风雨摧毁了许多房屋。(bào fēng yǔ cuī huǐ le xǔ duō fáng wū) - The storm destroyed many houses.
我们反对使用暴力。(wǒ men fǎn duì shǐ yòng bào lì) - We oppose the use of violence.
这起事件暴露了许多问题。(zhè qǐ shì jiàn bào lù le xǔ duō wèn tí) - This incident exposed many problems.

stage5.example: 暴雨导致了严重的洪水。(bào yǔ dǎo zhì le yán zhòng de hóng shuǐ) - The torrential rain caused serious flooding.

stage5.definition: To explode, to burst, to crack, to quick-fry
stage5.example: 气球爆了。(qì qiú bào le) - The balloon burst.

stage5.definition: To break out, to erupt, to burst
stage5.example: 战争爆发于1939年。(zhàn zhēng bào fā yú yī jiǔ sān jiǔ nián) - The war broke out in 1939.
工厂发生了爆炸。(gōng chǎng fā shēng le bào zhà) - There was an explosion at the factory.
他的童年非常悲惨。(tā de tóng nián fēi cháng bēi cǎn) - His childhood was very miserable.

stage6.example: 天热时，他只穿一件背心。(tiān rè shí, tā zhǐ chuān yī jiàn bèi xīn) - When it's hot, he wears only a vest.

stage6.definition: Behind someone's back, to carry on one's back
stage6.example: 他背着妻子去见朋友。(tā bèi zhe qī zi qù jiàn péng yǒu) - He went to see friends behind his wife's back.
被告否认了指控。(bèi gào fǒu rèn le zhǐ kòng) - The defendant denied the charges.
孩子们在草地上奔跑。(hái zi men zài cǎo dì shàng bēn pǎo) - The children are running on the grass.
本书介绍中国历史。(běn shū jiè shào zhōng guó lì shǐ) - This book introduces Chinese history.

stage7.example: 我是本地人。(wǒ shì běn dì rén) - I am a local person.

stage7.definition: Current period, current issue (of a publication)
stage7.example: 本期杂志已经出版。(běn qī zá zhì yǐ jīng chū bǎn) - The current issue of the magazine has been published.
这个问题本身就很复杂。(zhè ge wèn tí běn shēn jiù hěn fù zá) - The problem itself is very complex.

stage7.definition: Native land, one's native country, mainland, metropolitan territory
stage7.example: 这种文化源于本土。(zhè zhǒng wén huà yuán yú běn tǔ) - This culture originates from the native land.
我们要抓住问题的本质。(wǒ men yào zhuā zhù wèn tí de běn zhì) - We need to grasp the essence of the problem.

stage8.definition: To force, to compel, to press, to close, to narrow
stage8.example: 父母不应该逼孩子学习。(fù mǔ bù yīng gāi bī hái zi xué xí) - Parents shouldn't force their children to study.
面试之前要先通过笔试。(miàn shì zhī qián yào xiān tōng guò bǐ shì) - Before the interview, you need to pass the written examination.
这一政策必将促进经济发展。(zhè yī zhèng cè bì jiāng cù jìn jīng jì fā zhǎn) - This policy will certainly promote economic development.
这门课程是必修课。(zhè mén kè chéng shì bì xiū kè) - This course is compulsory.

stage8.definition: To close, to shut, to obstruct, to stop up
stage8.example: 他紧闭双眼。(tā jǐn bì shuāng yǎn) - He closed his eyes tightly.

stage9.example: 他站在悬崖的边缘。(tā zhàn zài xuán yá de biān yuán) - He stood on the edge of the cliff.

stage9.definition: To compile, to draw up, authorized strength (of a unit)
stage9.example: 公司计划编制新的预算。(gōng sī jì huà biān zhì xīn de yù suàn) - The company plans to draw up a new budget.
这个盒子很扁。(zhè ge hé zi hěn biǎn) - This box is very flat.

stage9.definition: To change, to alter, to modify
stage9.example: 我们需要变更计划。(wǒ men xū yào biàn gēng jì huà) - We need to change the plan.

stage9.definition: To transform, to convert, to vary, to alternate
stage9.example: 光线变换出不同的颜色。(guāng xiàn biàn huàn chū bù tóng de yán sè) - The light transforms into different colors.

stage10.definition: To deform, to be out of shape, deformation, metamorphosis
stage10.example: 金属在高温下会变形。(jīn shǔ zài gāo wēn xià huì biàn xíng) - Metal deforms under high temperature.
